description:
Momiji and Kusanagi worry about an upcoming ritual that will increase the power of Kaede and Susano-oh while Takeuchi tries to comfort Kunikida.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let It Bloom, Japan! A Blizzard of One-Sided Love!!
Que le Japon fleurisse ! Le blizzard de l’amour non-réciproque !
咲かせて! 日本! 片恋吹雪!!
